item.title: Background Check Your Doctor: Try This Health Care Provider Review Aggregator
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
I wrote a suite of scripts to help you background check your doctor. The Primary Care Provider Investigator imports a list of health care providers and then scrapes multiple review sites (e.g. Yelp, UCompareHealthCare) to aggregate their reviews: PCPInvestigator. This project was born of frustration with my health insurer’s “search for a doctor” function, which… Continue reading Background Check Your Doctor: Try This Health Care Provider Review Aggregator

item.title: Dead Week (Remastered)
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
Back and now mobile-friendly for your Halloween enjoyment! Evil is at the door. DEAD WEEK (Remastered): the week before final exams, college roommates face a horror they may not survive. “Dead Week” is an interactive horror webtoon with audio, playable in English or Korean. Headphones and a modern browser on a desktop computer are recommended… Continue reading Dead Week (Remastered)

item.title: “Meddling Auntie” on lesbian.com!
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
Check out “Meddling Auntie” on lesbian.com! Thanks to Lesbian.com for the interview and Kristine Chester, as always, for her kind support. Read more “Meddling Auntie” at meddlingauntie.com, purchase as eBook or trade paperback at Amazon, or purchase as a comic at IndyPlanet.

item.title: Meddling Auntie Comics: New Release Plus Giveaway!
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
Meddling Auntie Comics are now on Amazon as eBooks! The series includes a brand new, harsh-truth-soothing, squirm-inducing topic: Puberty. The comics will and should always remain free and open. However people have asked for other ways to read and share them, and I aim to deliver. Next week they’ll be available for print at Amazon… Continue reading Meddling Auntie Comics: New Release Plus Giveaway!

item.title: 3 Animators That Will Explode Your Brain
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
You work hard. You show kindness. You pay your taxes. You just remembered you have to pay your taxes. You deserve to meet three animators that will explode your brain. There are no fluffy 3D clouds or meet-cute plots here. But there are unforgettable images and squealing rapture. Time Consumption Advisory: these artists’ work is… Continue reading 3 Animators That Will Explode Your Brain

item.title: The Secret to Life is Programming
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
(This post created for and first appeared on Samantha Gay’s blog, February 21, 2015.) Twenty years ago I was depressed, confused, and out of ideas. Then I discovered programming. item.title: Dragon Age Inquisition: Missing Tarot Cards
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
Thanks to inspiration from /u/YouLeaveMeNoChoice and /u/Shady_Intent, here are seven of the missing eight tarot cards from Dragon Age: Inquisition. I’m still working on Josephine’s romance card. I made one, it just turned out goofy. Will fix soon. Stay tuned.
